item.title: Comment on How we can capture the market sales by admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://yosoyraiz.github.io/iamroot/how-we-can-capture-the-market-sales/#comment-2">admin</a>.
I rarely like to write reviews, but the Marketify team truly deserve a standing ovation for their customer support, customisation and most importantly, friendliness and professionalism.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to admin.

I rarely like to write reviews, but the Marketify team truly deserve a standing ovation for their customer support, customisation and most importantly, friendliness and professionalism.

item.description: Good overall template. I am getting back into coding and had a simple question for the author. They responded within 30 minutes and answered my question. Highly recommend. Keep it up!
